creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:
The official application for the passenger of Moscow. Do not stand in traffic jams - to move from the comfort!

Save time and money
Build and choose the best route. The app is easy to calculate the travel time, number of transfers and the total cost of the trip.

Move to facilities
Multimodal routes, taking into account all possible modes of transport (public transport, bicycles and private car). The application will show the movement and arrival time online, but still displays the available options (the presence in the cabin wi-fi, air conditioning, access for people with disabilities).
In the near future will be added taxis, scooters and karshering.

Forget about the queues
Refill "Troika" card balance, buy tickets for Aeroexpress and city shuttle right in the app.

Keep up to date
The most current news from the official Twitter of transport companies in the Annex. They will help in time to adjust your route and avoid delays.

Chat
The app determines your geopozitsiyu and show the actual tape of discussions, in which it is possible to have a dialogue with fellow travelers complain about the vehicle or driver.

Relax
Trips by public transport, places of interest, places of interest nearby and bright events in Moscow - all this is marked on a map or displayed on your interface.

Cheers
Navigation in augmented reality, a pedometer and count calories to help you achieve the cherished 10,000 steps a day and get to your destination quickly and having fun!

About the use of data
You do not have to give your real name to use the application. Geolocation data used for route guidance. Health data (HealthKit) used to calculate the daily activity and the exact number of steps in the route.
Using the personal data meets the Federal Law 152-FL. Learn more about privacy policy at www.api.mosgorpass.ru/license_agreement
descriptionShort: Moscow transit map, buses, trolleys, trams & metro in real-time

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In order to fight coronavirus, special digital passes are required to travel around Moscow on private and public transport.

Now in the app you can:
- Issue a pass, check its status and link the Troika card or car number.
- Find out the walking schedule at your address.

Move to facilities
Multimodal routes, taking into account all possible modes of transport (public transport, bicycles and private car). The application will show the movement and arrival time online, but still displays the available options (the presence in the cabin wi-fi, air conditioning, access for people with disabilities).
In the near future will be added taxis, scooters and karshering.

Forget about the queues
Refill "Troika" card balance, buy tickets for Aeroexpress and city shuttle right in the app.

Keep up to date
The most current news from the official Twitter of transport companies in the Annex. They will help in time to adjust your route and avoid delays.

Chat
The app determines your geopozitsiyu and show the actual tape of discussions, in which it is possible to have a dialogue with fellow travelers complain about the vehicle or driver.

Relax
Trips by public transport, places of interest, places of interest nearby and bright events in Moscow - all this is marked on a map or displayed on your interface.

Cheers
Navigation in augmented reality, a pedometer and count calories to help you achieve the cherished 10,000 steps a day and get to your destination quickly and having fun!

About the use of data
You do not have to give your real name to use the application. Geolocation data used for route guidance. Health data (HealthKit) used to calculate the daily activity and the exact number of steps in the route.
Using the personal data meets the Federal Law 152-FL. Learn more about privacy policy at www.api.mosgorpass.ru/license_agreement
descriptionShort: Moscow transit map, buses, trolleys, trams & metro in real-time

- Show occupancy bike rental stations directly on the map
- Edit the name in the profile

Stay with us!

Relax
Trips by public transport, places of interest, places of interest nearby and bright events in Moscow - all this is marked on a map or displayed on your interface.

Cheers
Navigation in augmented reality, a pedometer and count calories to help you achieve the cherished 10,000 steps a day and get to your destination quickly and having fun!

About the use of data
You do not have to give your real name to use the application. Geolocation data used for route guidance. Health data (HealthKit) used to calculate the daily activity and the exact number of steps in the route.
Using the personal data meets the Federal Law 152-FL. Learn more about privacy policy at www.api.mosgorpass.ru/license_agreement
descriptionShort: Moscow transit map, buses, trolleys, trams & metro in real-time

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Meet the new application functionality in version 6.0.1:

- Build the route through Moscow metro is now more convenient. In a separate mode Metro map, you can quickly build a route by subway, MCC and the MCD and see it on the scheme.
- A new layer is added - Urban parking. Turning on and off the Parking layer is possible in Layers settings.

title: Moscow transport

creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Meet the spring update in version 6.5:
- The application now has the option to purchase a subscription to the city bike rental Velobike and rent a bike
- The scooter rental has resumed its work, along with the functionality of free booking
- We also added the ability to check the congestion of city parking lots, ground transport, metro stations and metro cars

Stay with us! Enjoy your trip!

title: Moscow transport

creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:
The official application for the passenger of Moscow. Do not stand in traffic jams - to move from the comfort!

Save time and money
Build and choose the best route. The app is easy to calculate the travel time, number of transfers and the total cost of the trip.

Move to facilities
Multimodal routes, taking into account all possible modes of transport (public transport, bicycles and private car). The application will show the movement and arrival time online, but still displays the available options (the presence in the cabin wi-fi, air conditioning, access for people with disabilities).

Forget about the queues
Refill "Troika" card balance, buy tickets for Aeroexpress and city shuttle right in the app.

title: Moscow transport

creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:
The official application for the passenger of Moscow. Do not stand in traffic jams - to move from the comfort!

Save time and money
Build and choose the best route. The app is easy to calculate the travel time, number of transfers and the total cost of the trip.

Move to facilities
Multimodal routes, taking into account all possible modes of transport (public transport, bicycles and private car). The application will show the movement and arrival time online, but still displays the available options (the presence in the cabin wi-fi, air conditioning, access for people with disabilities).
In the near future will be added taxis, scooters and karshering.

Forget about the queues
Refill "Troika" card balance, buy tickets for Aeroexpress and city shuttle right in the app.

Keep up to date
The most current news from the official Twitter of transport companies in the Annex. They will help in time to adjust your route and avoid delays.

Chat
The app determines your geopozitsiyu and show the actual tape of discussions, in which it is possible to have a dialogue with fellow travelers complain about the vehicle or driver.

Relax
Trips by public transport, places of interest, places of interest nearby and bright events in Moscow - all this is marked on a map or displayed on your interface.

Cheers
Navigation in augmented reality, a pedometer and count calories to help you achieve the cherished 10,000 steps a day and get to your destination quickly and having fun!

About the use of data
You do not have to give your real name to use the application. Geolocation data used for route guidance. Health data (HealthKit) used to calculate the daily activity and the exact number of steps in the route.
Using the personal data meets the Federal Law 152-FL. Learn more about privacy policy at www.api.mosgorpass.ru/license_agreement
descriptionShort: Moscow transit map, buses, trolleys, trams & metro in real-time

Navigation in augmented reality, a pedometer and count calories to help you achieve the cherished 10,000 steps a day and get to your destination quickly and having fun!

About the use of data

Using the personal data meets the Federal Law 152-FL. Learn more about privacy policy at http://api.mosgorpass.ru/v8.2/offers/mt_license/html

Trips by public transport, places of interest, places of interest nearby and bright events in Moscow - all this is marked on a map or displayed on your interface.

Cheers
Navigation in augmented reality, a pedometer and count calories to help you achieve the cherished 10,000 steps a day and get to your destination quickly and having fun!

About the use of data
You do not have to give your real name to use the application. Geolocation data are used to display the location on the map, following the route, determine the distance to objects (scooters, electric charging stations, pick-up point in the Bus-on-demand service), receive information geo-targeted PUSH-notifications about changes in the operation of transport system and road closures.
Using the personal data meets the Federal Law 152-FL. Learn more about privacy policy at http://api.mosgorpass.ru/v8.2/offers/mt_license/html

title: Moscow transport

creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:
The official application for the passenger of Moscow. Do not stand in traffic jams - to move from the comfort!

Save time and money
Build and choose the best route. The app is easy to calculate the travel time, number of transfers and the total cost of the trip.

Move to facilities
Multimodal routes, taking into account all possible modes of transport (public transport, bicycles and private car). The application will show the movement and arrival time online, but still displays the available options (the presence in the cabin wi-fi, air conditioning, access for people with disabilities).
In the near future will be added taxis, scooters and karshering.

Forget about the queues
Refill "Troika" card balance, buy tickets for Aeroexpress and city shuttle right in the app.

Keep up to date
The most current news from the official Twitter of transport companies in the Annex. They will help in time to adjust your route and avoid delays.

Chat
The app determines your geopozitsiyu and show the actual tape of discussions, in which it is possible to have a dialogue with fellow travelers complain about the vehicle or driver.

Relax
Trips by public transport, places of interest, places of interest nearby and bright events in Moscow - all this is marked on a map or displayed on your interface.

Cheers
Navigation in augmented reality, a pedometer and count calories to help you achieve the cherished 10,000 steps a day and get to your destination quickly and having fun!

About the use of data
You do not have to give your real name to use the application. Geolocation data are used to display the location on the map, following the route, determine the distance to objects (scooters, electric charging stations, pick-up point in the Bus-on-demand service), receive information geo-targeted PUSH-notifications about changes in the operation of transport system and road closures.
Using the personal data meets the Federal Law 152-FL. Learn more about privacy policy at https://docs.mosgorpass.ru/privacypolicy.
descriptionShort: Moscow transit map, buses, trolleys, trams & metro in real-time

title: Moscow transport

creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:
Application for comfortable and fast trips around Moscow.

Find convenient routes
Moscow Transport takes into account all types of transport and user preferences, and then builds the best route. In this case, the application will show the approximate travel time, the cost of the trip, the number of transfers.

Track the city transport
The application shows in real time when the bus, electric bus or tram arrives at the stop. In addition, Moscow Transport news contains information about changing the traffic plan or bus route.

Save time and pay for services in the application
Directly at Moscow Transport, you can order a taxi, find the nearest bike rental station, book a scooter or rental car, buy a ticket for a river trip. Besides, the app allows you to top up your Troika transport card and buy Aeroexpress and City Shuttle tickets.

Explore the city and socialize
Moscow Transport marks interesting places and city events on the map. Listen to excursions during a river trip, and read descriptions of sights in the app while walking.

About data usage
We use information about your location to find better routes for you and show you an up-to-date discussion feed. We use personal data in accordance with Federal Law 152-FZ. The privacy policy can be found on the website:

https://docs.mosgorpass.ru/privacypolicy

title:
Moscow transport
9.2.0

creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:
Application for comfortable and fast trips around Moscow.

Find convenient routes
Moscow Transport takes into account all types of transport. The application selects the most convenient and fastest route. It shows the approximate travel time, cost of the trip and number of transfers. Moreover, it even helps you not to miss your stop.

Track the city transport
There is no need to stand at the bus stop waiting for the bus. The application shows all city transport and its schedule in real time, as well as changes in traffic patterns.

Save time and pay for services
Directly at Moscow Transport, you can order a taxi, find the nearest bike rental station, rent a scooter or car, buy a ticket for a river transport, commuter trains and Aeroexpress. Besides, the app allows you to top up your Troika transport card on the way to the stop.

Explore the city and socialize
Enjoy your time. The application marks interesting places and city events on the map. Listen to excursions during a river trip, and read descriptions of sights in the application while walking.

About data usage
We use information about your location to find better routes for you and show you an up-to-date discussion feed. We use personal data in accordance with Federal Law 152-FZ. The privacy policy can be found on the website:

https://api.mosgorpass.ru/v8.2/offers/mt_policy/html

title:
Moscow transport
9.2.2

creator: Moscow Department of Transport
descriptionHtml:
Application for comfortable and fast trips around Moscow.

Find convenient routes
Moscow Transport takes into account all types of transport. The application selects the most convenient and fastest route. It shows the approximate travel time, cost of the trip and number of transfers. Moreover, it even helps you not to miss your stop.

Track the city transport
There is no need to stand at the bus stop waiting for the bus. The application shows all city transport and its schedule in real time, as well as changes in traffic patterns.

Save time and pay for services
Directly at Moscow Transport, you can order a taxi, find the nearest bike rental station, rent a scooter or car, buy a ticket for a river transport, commuter trains and Aeroexpress. Besides, the app allows you to top up your Troika transport card on the way to the stop.

Explore the city and socialize
Enjoy your time. The application marks interesting places and city events on the map. Listen to excursions during a river trip, and read descriptions of sights in the application while walking.

About data usage
We use information about your location to find better routes for you and show you an up-to-date discussion feed. We use personal data in accordance with Federal Law 152-FZ. The privacy policy can be found on the website:

https://api.mosgorpass.ru/v8.2/offers/mt_policy/html
descriptionShort: Moscow transit map, buses, trolleys, trams & metro in real-time

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Spring is here! There are also new ways of moving around the city. Please update your app to use them.
